=== About me ===

Welcome to my personal page. My name is Lioh Moeller. I was born in September 1976 in Germany.

I have been the leader of the Swiss Ubuntu !LoCo team and regularly organize Ubuntu events.

=== Contributions ===

* Organized <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/Ubucon13|Ubucon]]</nowiki> in Zurich 
* Represented Ubuntu at the Open Source for Startups event in Zurich at Hiltl
* Showed off the new features of Ubuntu 12.10 on Open Tuesday in Zurich at Digicomp 
* Organized <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/Ubucon12|Ubucon]]</nowiki> in Winterthur 
* First <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/RegionalContacts|Regional Contact cleanup]]</nowiki>
* Established <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/Marketing_material|Marketing Material]]</nowiki> management
* Updated the Swiss team <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam|Wiki start page]]</nowiki> to make it look  fancier and neat
* Coordinated <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu-locoteams/+bug/784673|re-approval]]</nowiki> of the Swiss !LoCo team
* Organized <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/2011-GNOME3ReleaseParty-Zurich|GNOME 3 Release Party]]</nowiki> in Zurich
* Organized <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/2011-UbuntuGlobalJam-Zurich|Ubuntu Global Jam]]</nowiki> in Zurich
* Ubuntu Swiss team !LoCo lead
* Organized <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SwissTeam/2010-FrOSCamp|FrOSCamp]]</nowiki>
* '''since 2006''' Supporting people with Ubuntu

=== Plans ===

Plans for my future contributions to Ubuntu:

* Strengthen the Swiss Ubuntu community
* Organize Ubuntu related events in Switzerland

=== Testimonials ===

Note: This section is for existing Ubuntu members to leave testimonials.

If you know me and my contributions to the Ubuntu community, it would be kind if you could leave a nice comment here.

==== Ralf Hersel (Nov. 2013) ====
I know Lioh since 2012 as an active member of the open source community. She has an excellent technical knowledge of several Linux distributions and applications. Due to his longtime contribution to the community she is very well known in Switzerland and Germany. I always enjoyed to work with Lioh because of his know-how and his reliability.

==== Hassan aka. WaVeR (15th Nov. 2013) ====
Lioh is one of the most active member in our <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-ch.org|LoCo Team]]</nowiki>. She organized/participated to our events. ==== Lucas Betschart (November 2013) ====
Lioh is one of the most well known person in the Swiss FOSS community for her work in the several FOSS projects and building Open Source communities in Switzerland. She's a woman with very strong principles regarding Freedom of Speech and Free Software. She attended and organized nearly every monthly Ubuntu meetup we had since 2010, which proves that she's very reliable. A vote for Lioh is a vote for a more open world ;D

==== Torsten Franz (Ubuntu Member, Loco Contact Germany) ====
